["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"输入如下命令，下载 ROS 的 GPG Key："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt install curl gnupg2
{{sudo}}curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ros/rosdistro/master/ros.key  -o /usr/share/keyrings/ros-archive-keyring.gpg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Ubuntu 24.04 LTS",{"release_name":"noble"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"release_name":"bionic"}],["Debian 12 (bookworm)",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11 (bullseye)",{"release_name":"bullseye"}]]}],"code":"echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/ros-archive-keyring.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu {{release_name}} main" | {{sudo}}tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros2.list > /dev/null

{{sudo}}apt update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Reference: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.ros.org/en/jazzy/Installation/Ubuntu-Install-Debians.html","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://docs.ros.org/en/jazzy/Installation/Ubuntu-Install-Debians.html"}]]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rosdep","children":"rosdep"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/rosdistro/","children":"ROS Distro 帮助"}]]}]]}]
